segments.text: Hi , Bill . I ’ d like to take the apartment I looked at yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what do we do now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is the lease . You should read the lease very carefully before you sign it because it describes your legal rights and responsibilities as a tenant . The lease also describes our rights and responsibilities as landlords .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . ( Reads the lease ) So , according to the lease , I ’ ll deposit one month ’ s rent as a security deposit , and I have to pay the first month ’ s rent in advance . I understand that I ’ ll get the security deposit back when I move out if the apartment does not need any costly repairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . If you do not damage the apartment , you will get your security deposit back when you move out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I pay you by check ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . A check will be fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there a laundry room in the basement ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I sign the lease right now ?
segments.speaker: S2
